titleStmt.title: The lives of saints written in Spanish, by the learned and reuerend father Alfonso Villegas, diuine and preacher. ; Translated out of Italian into English, and conferred with the Spanish. By W. & E.K. B..

publicationStmt.publisher: By the widow of Laurence Kellam, at the signe of the holy Lambe.,

notesStmt.note: Translation of Flos sanctorum--Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
